ARTICLE.TITLE: Culture, Joy and Wonder: Holiday Season in Historic and Scenic Santa Fe County at Santa Fe Plaza, Santa Fe
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Santa Fe County is magical throughout the holiday season, and we invite all to visit, to unwind and spend the holiday season with us.

Enjoy a dose of small town charm, visit the village of Madrid for early holiday shopping, Dec 7-22. And definitely don’t want to miss the Madrid Christmas Parade, starting at 4pm on Dec 7.

The annual Pecos National Historical Park’s Farolito Walk on Dec 16 offers an opportunity to dive into New Mexico culture and the area’s incredible natural landscapes.

On Dec 17 join us for the Pecos National Historical Park’s Las Posadas, where each year St. Anthony’s Parish in Pecos celebrates this event in representation of Mary and Joseph’s journey to Bethlehem.

For those planning a holiday getaway later, bring in 2020 at the Fourth Annual New Year’s Eve on the Plaza in America’s oldest capital city surrounded by food, fun and culture.

For more information on events in the Santa Fe area, visit santafenmtrue.com.
